name: Shoot Bubble Candy Kingdom
description:
" Shoot Bubble Candy Kingdom " is an all new and super-addictive puzzler! This is the most classic and amazing shooting bubble buster game.

This deluxe version is the only one that contains different modes like Puzzle Mode, Arcade Mode, Simple Shooting Mode, Spin & Rotate Mode & Digger Mode.

Use your slingshot to make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to match and burst or pop colorful bubbles. Clear all the bubbles to level up. Strategic and very intuitive game play make for a challenging and satisfying bubble popping experience!

Features :
1. Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
2. Hundreds of magical levels.
3. Leaderboard to watch your friends and competitors.
4. Special Pops - a six-match streak unlocks a super powered bubble.
5. Action-packed game play - get out your slingshot and start popping.
6. Loads of addictive puzzles.
7. Well-designed FREE levels - each with unique challenges and fun puzzles.
8. Fresh and beautiful style, bright and vibrant graphics & effects.

Tips :
- Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your quest.
- Unlock boosts for added bubble popping power.
- Breaking the bubbles continuously can get points as bonus.
- Score Big Bonuses - drop large bunches of bubbles to score bonus.
- Master your bubble flinging and use strategy to crack tricky levels.

Its FREE & always will be!
FREE update with more exciting & magical levels with more boosters are coming soon…
